text: __NOTOC__ 231 (CCXXXI) was a common year starting on Saturday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Emperor Alexander Severus fights against the Persians. ==== Asia ==== * Zhuge Liang starts the fourth of his Northern Expeditions against the state of Cao Wei. === By topic === ==== Religion ==== * Origen, disciple of Ammonius Saccas, founder of Neoplatonism, is sent away to Caesarea. == Births == * Cao Fang, Emperor of the Kingdom of Wei (d. 274) * Sun Chen, regent of the Kingdom of Wu (d. 258) == Deaths == * Cao Zhen, general of Kingdom of Wei (b. 185) * Hua Xin, adviser of Kingdom of Wei (b. 157) * Li Hui, minister of Kingdom of Shu * Zhang He, military leader under Cao Cao (b. 167) Category:230s
